mapper.select: SELECT shopping_cart.order_id AS order_id, shopping_cart.client_id AS client_id, shopping_cart.movie_id AS movie_id, movie.category_id AS category_id, shopping_cart.order_date AS order_date, movie.title AS movie_title, category.title AS category_title, movie.release_date AS release_date, movie.rating AS rating, movie.price * (1 - NVL((SELECT coupon.discount FROM coupon LEFT JOIN client_coupon ON client_coupon.coupon_id = coupon.coupon_id WHERE client_coupon.client_id = #{clientId}), 1) / 100) AS price FROM shopping_cart LEFT JOIN movie ON shopping_cart.movie_id = movie.movie_id LEFT JOIN category ON movie.category_id = category.category_id WHERE shopping_cart.client_id = #{clientId} GROUP BY shopping_cart.order_id
INSERT INTO shopping_cart (order_id, client_id, movie_id, order_date) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{clientId}, #{movieId}, #{orderDate})
